pages.text: isi tarah jo log un se pehle guzre hai, un ke paas jo bhi rasool aya, unhone keh diya ke ya to ye jaadugar hai ya deewana hai
kya ye is baath ki ek dosre ko wasiyath karte gaye hai
(nahi) balke ye sab ke sab sarkash hai, to aap un se mu pher le,aap par koyi malaamath nahi
aur nasihath karte rahe, yaqinan ye nasihath imaan waalo ko nafa degi
main ne jinnaath aur insaano ko mahez isi liye payda kiya hai ke wo sirf meri ibaadath kare
na main un se rozi chahta hoon, na meri ye chaahath hai ke ye mujhe khilaaye
Allah taâ€™ala to khud hee sab ka rozi rasa, tawanaayi waala aur zoor aawar hai
pas jin logo ne zulm kiya hai, unhe bhi un ke saathiyo ke hisse ke misl, hissa milega, lehaza wo mujh se jaldi talab na kare
pas qaraabi hai munkiro ko un ke us din ki jis ka waada diye jaate hai
qasam hai toor ki
aur likhi hoyi kitaab ki
jo jhilli ke khule hoye warq mein hai
aur abaadh ghar ki
aur oonchi chath ki
aur bhad kaaye hoye samandar ki
beshak aap ke rab ka azaab ho kar rehne wala hai
ose koyi rokne waala nahi
jis din asmaan thar thraane lagega
aur pahaad chalne phirne lagenge
us din jhutlaane waalo ki (puri) qaraabi hai
jo apni be huda goyi mein uchal koodh kar rahe hai
jis din wo dhakke de de kar aatishe jahannam ki taraf laaye jayenge
yahi wo aatish dozakh hai jise tum jhoot batlaate thein
